name: WANTED: Outlaw
description:
WANTED: Outlaw

You play as a wanted outlaw. You're in the middle of a wasteland, there's police everywhere, you know there's no point in running, the end is inevitable. The only thing left is to try and shoot as many as possible.

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Player movement
  • Mouse - Shooting
Special Thanks:

Tileset by: https://opengameart.org/users/surt
